fields.title: Java
fields.header: The Land of a Thousand Histories
fields.summary: Java has many exhilarating natural and cultural attractions that are yet to be discovered. Explore many exciting destinations from Ujung Kulon to Baluran National Park, from Jakarta to Surabaya.

fields.title: Bali & Nusa Tenggara
fields.header: Bali & Nusa Tenggara: The Charm of Indonesia's Southeastern Archipelago
fields.summary: Bali & Nusa Tenggara are unmatched beauties, a must to experience at least once in a lifetime. Marvel at the myriad charms of the islands, from the luxury of Nusa Dua to the exciting culture of Wae Rebo Village.

fields.title: Maluku & Papua
fields.header: Maluku & Papua: Paradise of the East
fields.summary: Maluku & Papua host extraordinary wonders that will last forever in your memory. Explore the beauty, from Kei Island to Raja Ampat.

fields.title: Kalimantan
fields.summary: Kalimantan offers a complete adventure with awesome excitement from Tanjung Puting National Park to the small islands of Derawan.
